sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardTitle } from '../components/Card'; import { DocumentTextIcon, CalendarIcon, UserIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const HealthRecords = () => { const [records] = useState([ { id: 1, type: 'Medical History', date: '2024-01-15', doctor: 'Dr. Sarah Johnson', description: 'Annual physical examination' }, { id: 2, type: 'Lab Results', date: '2024-01-10', doctor: 'Lab Corp', description: 'Blood test results - Cholesterol panel' }, { id: 3, type: 'Prescription', date: '2024-01-08', doctor: 'Dr. Michael Chen', description: 'Amoxicillin 500mg - 10 days' } ]); return (

Health Records

Access and manage your complete medical history in one secure place

{/* Records List */}

Your Medical Records

{records.map((record) => (

{record.type}

{record.description}

{record.date}
{record.doctor}
))}
{/* Health Summary */}
Health Summary

Last Checkup

January 15, 2024

Dr. Sarah Johnson

Current Medications

  • • Amoxicillin (until Jan 18)
  • • Vitamin D Supplement

Allergies

No known allergies

Emergency Contact

John Doe - (555) 123-4567

Privacy & Security

Your health records are encrypted and protected. Only you and authorized healthcare providers can access this information.

); }; export default HealthRecords;
